trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>類型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> representing the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>代表週框矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the element, or <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*> if the element is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，其中包含的項目，座標或<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>如果此項目的<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> provides access to its content through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>, this method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer>提供透過其內容的存取權<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>，這個方法一律會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> ，代表位於的可點選空間<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref>允許按一下項目上。

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) if the element is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 點值都是 (<xref:System.Double.NaN>， <xref:System.Double.NaN>) 如果此項目的<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is off of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer"></xref>是不在畫面。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, the element can be on the screen but still not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，項目可以在螢幕上，但仍不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: An example is an element that is obscured by other elements.
trans-unit.target: 範例是由其他項目會隱藏的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目不在畫面上否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
